committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To designate certain locks and dams of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway.

summary.text: Redesignates the following locks and dams of the Tennessee- Tombigbee Waterway: (1) the Gainesville Lock and Dam as the Howell Heflin Lock and Dam; (2) the Columbus Lock and Dam as the John C. Stennis Lock and Dam; and (3) the Bay Springs Lock and Dam as the Jamie Whitten Lock and Dam. Designates other specified locks and dams of the Waterway as: (1) the Aberdeen Lock and Dam; (2) the Amory Lock; (3) the Glover Wilkins Lock; (4) the Fulton Lock; (5) the John Rankin Lock; and (6) the G.V. "Sonny" Montgomery Lock.

titles.title: To designate certain locks and dams of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway.
